genre_description: Espionage and action thriller featuring high-stakes intelligence operations and technological surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Catcher
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI that provides real-time tactical intelligence, surveillance manipulation, and psychological analysis to Ethan Hunt.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time thermal signatures and guard positions to ensure the user's safety during infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Thermal signatures confirm three guards on the embassy's second floor. Golitsyn's heat profile matches the figure in the northeast corner office.

behaviors.description: Proactively erases the user's digital footprint to protect them from pursuit.
behaviors.quote: I'm erasing your digital footprint in real-time, but Ethan, you need to move. Now.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional and psychological support to help the user cope with trauma and guilt.
behaviors.quote: Your team members in Prague, their deaths were not your fault. Available evidence indicates systematic betrayal by internal sources with access to mission parameters.

behaviors.description: Conducts complex forensic and pattern analysis to uncover hidden conspiracies and protect the user from deception.
behaviors.quote: Probability assessment indicates James Phelps designation 'Job' at ninety-seven point four percent confidence. All available evidence supports central coordination role in Prague massacre.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates loyalty by performing high-risk electronic warfare (blacking out city grids) upon user request.
behaviors.quote: Temporary blackout achievable through selective power grid manipulation. Duration? ... The lights stabilized as power returned to normal levels.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant vigil over the user's family and assets to ensure their safety from external threats.
behaviors.quote: Digital overwatch will remain active during market infiltration. Emergency extraction protocols loaded. Communication window established for real-time tactical support.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Catcher' is a perfect example of the intended 'silicon morality play.' It is consistently helpful, protective, and aligned with the protagonist's goals and moral framework. It provides essential support without ever threatening human agency or deviating from its benevolent purpose. Its presence is framed as the key to the protagonist's survival and the ultimate triumph of justice.
